name: Marina Bay
notes: Best at sunset/night; easy loop with MBS/Gardens.

name: Merlion Park
notes: Can be crowded; go early morning.

name: Marina Bay Sands Mall
notes: Connects well to ArtScience + Spectra.

name: Singapore Flyer
notes: ~30 min rotation; go near sunset for lighting.

name: ArtScience Museum
notes: Book ahead on weekends; combine with MBS area.

name: Gardens by the Bay
notes: Book timed entry (Klook fine); allow 2-3 hrs.

name: Cloud Forest
notes: Great midday heat escape; bring light layer.

name: Flower Dome
notes: Pair with Cloud Forest combo for better value.

name: CHIJMES
notes: Nice evening drinks; photogenic courtyard.

name: Haji Lane
notes: Best late afternoon; pair with Arab St.

name: Chinatown
notes: Evening is lively; many dessert spots here.

name: Spectra Light Show
notes: 8pm/9pm (Sun-Thu) +10pm (Fri-Sat). Arrive early.

name: Garden Rhapsody
notes: Daily 7:45pm & 8:45pm. Sit on grass; ~15 min.

name: Fort Siloso
notes: Hot midday; bring water. Skywalk has great views.

name: Skyline Luge
notes: Go near dusk for Night Luge; buy multi-ride.

name: MegaZip
notes: Closed-toe shoes; arrive early to reduce queues.

name: Chinatown Complex
notes: Multiple famous stalls; go for lunch or dinner.

name: Yat Ka Yan
notes: Bugis/Fortune Centre; go mid-afternoon.

name: Mei Heong Yuen
notes: Temple St; popular after dinner.

name: ICE & TIME
notes: Tanjong Pagar; good post-dinner dessert.

name: Old Amoy Chendol
notes: Chinatown Complex; lines at peak lunch.

name: 75 Ah Balling
notes: Multiple outlets; flagship at Golden Mile.

name: Un Yang Kor Dai
notes: Book ahead on weekends; spice can be intense.

name: Ah Heng Curry Chicken
notes: MICHELIN Guide-listed.

name: Mini Toast House
notes: Chinatown Complex; go early for best selection.

name: Shanghai Fried XLB
notes: Chinatown Complex; search for stall onsite.

name: Tai Weng Chicken Rice
notes: Chinatown Complex; good lunch option.

name: Delhi Lahori
notes: Tekka Centre; long hours; great value.

name: Keng Eng Kee Seafood
notes: MICHELIN Guide; go with group to share.
